Articles.Content:
This is my first successful spaceplane.

It is capable of sustained extremely low altitude flight, and current range is unknown due to a lack of flight experience.

Be careful when taking off -- default thrust is just enough to get it to float upwards slowly, so set it to full. Once at desired altitude, you can reduce thrust to the first big line on the gauge to conserve fuel.

Requires C7\'s Flight Pack and Tuned SAS.
Unfortunately not. I\'m not going to set that up until I know that I\'m going to be producing a fair amount of pictures that I want to share.
You don\'t need to set anything up; you can just attach pictures to your posts.
